page.title: 06A FARMER'S WIFE IN PLAISH
page.content: I have now been a farmer's wife for 4 years. Living in a large rented house (old enough to be in the original Domesday Book) with a small child, means long hours and sometimes difficult times. With all the modern appliances of today the everyday chores are made a lot easier, but there is still a great deal to do. I am constantly decorating, as this lovely old house has not been touched for over 20 years. As mentioned, it is rented, so as well as battling single- handed with wet and dry rot, I am also battling with the Landlord, the hardest battle of all.
